answers.answer: Hi there,Firstly it needs to be determined that whether you are having blood in urine or bleeding from vagina.Increased frequency of urination along with blood in urine can be due to urinary tract infection, kidney stones,pyelonephritis,bladder infection etc.The other causes of increased urinary frequency are  overactive bladder, urinary incontinence, diabetes, vaginitis and pregnancy. See a doctor and take up urine test for determining if there are any pus cells or red blood cells in the urine. Other tests will depend on the clinical examination and urine test results. I sincerely hope it helps. Do keep me posted.Best luck and regards!

question: it started today, I have to pee about once an hour, and when I do I don't pee a lot like I'm suppose to. Also it comes with pain or like an orgasm feeling and then i noticed when I wiped that I bled alittle. I'm a girl by the way. And I get like a weird feeling above my vagina, also I'm not near my period. Answers to what's happening please.
title: urinery track infection?
